title: i18n framework — react-i18next setup with full Bahasa Indonesia coverage
description: Set up react-i18next with static JSON resources (id + en locales). Extracted ~200 hardcoded Indonesian strings from 18 component/page files into locale JSON. API error messages use i18n.t() directly. Default language is Indonesian; English locale as developer reference. No language switcher yet — infrastructure supports i18n.changeLanguage(). PR #16 merged.
